title: canvas.Clear(SKColors.Transparent) does not work on XF/Android when I use SKGLView.
body:
SkiaSharp ver : 1.56.0
tested on Xamarin.Forms 

"canvas.Clear(SKColors.Transparent);" does not work when I use SKGLView on XF/Android.

It's working fine on XF/iOS.
And both are working fine when I use SKCanvasView.

and I set already View's backgroud color as "transparent" as well.

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body:
I think Android is a bit limited (http://stackoverflow.com/questions/2034822/android-opengl-es-transparent-background) in that you can either have an opaque GL surface below everything, or a transparent GL surface above everything. Nothing in between.

There are suggestions to use a [`TextureView`](https://developer.android.com/reference/android/view/TextureView.html), but I will need to first create a renderer.

comments.author: allbdeveloper
comments.body:
Hi Matthew. 

Thanks for your research and answer.

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body: Closing this as I will have to use a `TextureView` (#263) to support transparency.
